text: Anyone have some suggestion on constructing an integrate function considering discrete time steps for stochastic differential equation (equation of motion). I have read the document of DifferentialEquation,jl. The integrator idea presented there is not clear to me.

elements.text: Anyone have some suggestion on constructing an integrate function considering discrete time steps for stochastic differential equation (equation of motion). I have read the document of DifferentialEquation,jl. The integrator idea presented there is not clear to me.

text: what is the actual question here?

elements.text: what is the actual question here?

text: I want to write a integrate function in discrete time for Stochastic DAE (eg. RK method for ODE) that I can call in every iteration. I have two sets of variables (state and control) and control dependent Brownian motion noise.

elements.text: I want to write a integrate function in discrete time for Stochastic DAE (eg. RK method for ODE) that I can call in every iteration. I have two sets of variables (state and control) and control dependent Brownian motion noise.

text: Write it in mass matrix form.

elements.text: Write it in mass matrix form.
